author: Simon Difford
description: If you like Pi√±a Coladas but are too embarrassed to order one then this drink is for you.
name: Bahia
recipeIngredient: 75 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws
